metadata.title: CVE-2023-2789 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in GNU cflow 1.7. It has been rated asproblematic. This issue affects the functionfunc_body/parse_variable_declaration of the file parser.c. The manipulationleads to denial of service. The exploit has been disclosed to the publicand may be used. The identifier VDB-229373 was assigned to thisvulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosurebut did not respond in any way.

criterions.comment: cflow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
